mapper.select: select c.uid, d.cname, d.region, d.relphone, d.authid, d.relperson, e.dictvalue from tb_dept_user a LEFT JOIN tb_company_dept b on a.cdid = b.cdid left join tb_company_common c on a.uid = c.uid left join tb_company_list d on c.cid = d.cid left join tb_company_property e on c.cid = e.cid where b.duid = #{uid} and e.typeid = 't111111'
